Name: Together in the Petal Rain
AttributesDescription: Bruno happened to capture this moment at the height of the celebration.
BgDescription: She has preserved many such memories in this way to guard against the fading blur brought on by her Anchoring ability. Those photos have blurred in the eyes of those who no longer recall her. Butâ€¦ this one marks a beginning. Moonlight pours down, filling the quiet void. For the first time, the present belongs to both of you.
ObtainedShowDescription: A photo of you and Iuno taken by the Ceremonial Officer Bruno.
